name: DnDice
description:
Welcome to DnDice, slay waves of mythical creatures  as a wizard who embarks on an fantastical journey! 

Use magic!

Upgrade your dice!

Try to live an other day... if you can!

CONTROLS:

To start your turn, choose from 3 actions:

Attack: Regular attack on the selected enemy minion.

Defend:  Uses a shield to protect yourself until your next action.

Ability: Throws a fire attack that hits all enemy minions. (Cooldown of 3 turns)

When the action is selected, pick the dice and throw it to execute the action, and see how much the action is worth.

INVENTORY (Top Left):

Scroll: Resets the cooldown of the ability.

Potion: Restores  15 hp.
